Simple List

```js
<List>
  <ListItem>Hungerford</ListItem>
  <ListItem>Portland</ListItem>
  <ListItem>Hoffman Estates</ListItem>
</List>
```

Dense List

```js
<List dense>
  <ListItem>Hungerford</ListItem>
  <ListItem>Portland</ListItem>
  <ListItem>Hoffman Estates</ListItem>
</List>
```

List With Icons

```js
<List>
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>email</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>
    Hungerford
  </ListItem>
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>chat</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>
    Portland
  </ListItem>
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>call</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>
    Hoffman Estates
  </ListItem>
</List>
```

List with avatars:

```js
<List avatar>
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Avatar style={{ backgroundColor: "#bdbdbd" }} />
    </ListItemGraphic>
    Single-line item
  </ListItem>
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Avatar style={{ backgroundColor: "#bdbdbd" }} />
    </ListItemGraphic>
    Single-line item
  </ListItem>
</List>
```

Full-Width Dividers

```js
<List>
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>email</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>
    Hungerford
  </ListItem>
  <ListDivider />
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>chat</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>
    Portland
  </ListItem>
  <ListDivider />
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>call</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>Hoffman Estates
  </ListItem>
</List>
```

Inset Dividers

```js
<List>
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>email</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>
    Hungerford
  </ListItem>
  <ListDivider inset />
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>chat</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>
    Portland
  </ListItem>
  <ListDivider inset />
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>call</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>Hoffman Estates
  </ListItem>
</List>
```

Interactive List With Ripples

```js
<NavList>
  <NavListItem href="#">
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>email</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>Hungerford
  </NavListItem>
  <NavListItem href="#">
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>chat</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>Portland
  </NavListItem>
  <NavListItem href="#">
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>call</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>Hoffman Estates
  </NavListItem>
</NavList>
```

Two-Line List

```js
<List multiLine>
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemText>
      Hungerford
      <ListItemTextSecondary>United Kingdon</ListItemTextSecondary>
    </ListItemText>
  </ListItem>
  <ListDivider />
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemText>
      Portland
      <ListItemTextSecondary>United States</ListItemTextSecondary>
    </ListItemText>
  </ListItem>
  <ListDivider />
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemText>
      Hyderabad
      <ListItemTextSecondary>India</ListItemTextSecondary>
    </ListItemText>
  </ListItem>
</List>
```

Two-Line List With Icons

```js
<List multiLine>
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>email</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>
    <ListItemText>
      Hungerford
      <ListItemTextSecondary>United Kingdon</ListItemTextSecondary>
    </ListItemText>
  </ListItem>
  <ListDivider />
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>chat</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>
    <ListItemText>
      Portland
      <ListItemTextSecondary>United States</ListItemTextSecondary>
    </ListItemText>
  </ListItem>
  <ListDivider />
  <ListItem>
    <ListItemGraphic>
      <Icon>call</Icon>
    </ListItemGraphic>
    <ListItemText>
      Hyderabad
      <ListItemTextSecondary>India</ListItemTextSecondary>
    </ListItemText>
  </ListItem>
</List>
```

Selectable list:

```js
class ListExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      data: [
        {
          id: 0,
          label: "Hungerford",
          selected: false
        },
        {
          id: 1,
          label: "Portland",
          selected: false
        },
        {
          id: 2,
          label: "Hyderabad",
          selected: false
        }
      ]
    };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <List>
        {this.state.data.map(({ id, label, selected }) => (
          <ListItem
            key={id}
            selected={selected}
            onClick={() =>
              this.setState({
                data: this.state.data.map(item => {
                  if (item.id === id) {
                    return { ...item, selected: !item.selected };
                  }
                  return item;
                })
              })
            }
          >
            {label}
          </ListItem>
        ))}
      </List>
    );
  }
}

<ListExample />;
```
